title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Millions of others were rehabilitated posthumously.” [From an article about Russia by Barry Schweid in The Patriot Ledger, Quincy, Massachusetts, 14 February 1987. Submitted by Dr. Adam G. N. Moore, Boston.]
